response: Welcome to the OLA scooter module. Our scooter features a modern retro look, available in 12 colors, with twin projector lead headlamps for visibility. It offers best in class acceleration and range, with a spacious boot space for convenience. The scooter's battery life is 7 years or 150,000 kilometers, ensuring peace of mind. It also includes handlebar controls, a TFT LCD instrument cluster, and navigation for a better riding experience. Additional features include home charging, hypercharging, music on the go, and a companion app for real-time scooter condition. Enjoy the comfort of our seats, convenience of a bag hook, and safety with our locking system. Thank you.
